Reviews.Title: OMG....run away!!!! This phone is a joke!
Reviews.Author: Julie A. Moritz
Reviews.Content: This is the worse phone I've ever owned!  I had to take it in to t-mobile several times for a master reset due to freezing of all functions.  When they couldn't fix it t-mobile would give me a new one...3 before my 2 yr contract was up and I could upgrade.  The last time it shut down was 10 days before my upgrade (I was counting the hours by then), the guy at t-mobile laughed and said he had 5 during his 2 years!  This phone belongs in the trash...

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile.
Trim, stylish smartphone in white/mint with Windows Mobile 6.1 and enhanced user interface for easy navigation
Wi-Fi connectivity for Web browsing and access to T-Mobile's Hotspot Enabled unlimited calling service;
2-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth for handsfree devices and stereo music; MicroSD expansion up to 8 GB; digital audio player
Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 168 hours (7 days) of standby time
Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
ProductInfo.Name: HTC T-Mobile Shadow 2009 II 2 Unlocked Phone with Wi-Fi, WM 6.1, Bluetooth, Music Player and Organizer--U.S. Version(White)
